title: About Creando
badgeText: Built from the ground up in Aruba
missionQuote: We believe education should grow from the realities, needs, and dreams of the people who live here, not from imported models.

ourStory.heading: Our Story
ourStory.content:
Creando was created through collaboration between artists, organisers, and collectives who have lived the gap in access to design and digital culture education in Aruba. Many had to leave for the Netherlands to study and sustain their practice.

These shared experiences brought us together to connect existing efforts on the island and build something new from within.

ourApproach.heading: Our Approach
ourApproach.content:
Our approach is hands-on and collaborative: learning by doing, experimenting, and building together. We connect creative practice with local culture, sustainability, and the Caribbean's unique way of seeing and making.

Creando is part school, part laboratory, and part community space — a place where young people can develop the skills, confidence, and networks to imagine and build the futures they want, right here in the Caribbean.

financingText: Project financed by Stimuleringsfonds 2025 — Platforms for Design Learning.
